# This file must be evaluated after the file(s) defining the archetypes being duplicated.
# The equipment attributes alias, type, variant_name, and derived_variant_name are not duplicated.

duplicate_archetypes = {

	# light_tank

	light_tank_aa_chassis = {
		archetype = light_tank_chassis
		type = { armor anti_air }

		for_each = {
			# For each duplicated equipment type (excluding the archetype), set variant_name by taking what would be
			# used as the localization key (the name of the type) and run a find-and-replace on it.
			# Example: light_tank_aa_chassis_1 gets variant_name light_tank_aa_chassis_1.
			variant_name = { find_and_replace = { "chassis" "equipment" } }
		}
	}

	light_tank_infantry_support_chassis = {
		archetype = light_tank_chassis
		type = { armor amphibious }
		for_each = {
			variant_name = { find_and_replace = { "chassis" "equipment" } }
		}
	}

	light_tank_assault_chassis = {
		archetype = light_tank_chassis
		type = { armor flame }
		for_each = {
			variant_name = { find_and_replace = { "chassis" "equipment" } }
		}
	}

	light_tank_artillery_chassis = {
		archetype = light_tank_chassis
		type = { armor artillery }
		for_each = {
			variant_name = { find_and_replace = { "chassis" "equipment" } }
		}
	}

	light_tank_destroyer_chassis = {
		archetype = light_tank_chassis
		type = { armor anti_tank }
		for_each = {
			variant_name = { find_and_replace = { "chassis" "equipment" } }
		}
	}

	tank_fra_medium_chassis_td_3 = {  #SOMUA S35 CA
		is_frame = no
		abbreviation = "SOMUAS35"
		year = 1943
		archetype = medium_tank_destroyer_chassis
		priority = 2000
		is_convertable = yes
		can_convert_from = {
			tank_fra_medium_chassis_3
			tank_fra_medium_chassis_3_2
		}

		soft_attack = 0
		maximum_speed = 6.6

	tank_usa_modern_chassis_spg_2 = {  #M55
		is_frame = no
		abbreviation = "M46Patton"
		year = 1936
		archetype = modern_tank_artillery_chassis
		# parent = tank_usa_modern_chassis_spg_2
		priority = 2000
		is_convertable = yes

			tank_usa_modern_chassis_spg_2
			tank_usa_modern_chassis_2
			tank_usa_modern_chassis_2_2
		}

		armor_value = 130
		soft_attack = 0
		maximum_speed = 8.4
		breakthrough = 2
		defense = 3
		hardness = 1.01
		reliability = 0.95
		max_strength = 4.0
		fuel_consumption = 4.0

			steel = 4
			chromium = 2
		}

				required = yes

				}
			}

				required = yes
				allowed_module_categories = {
					tank_m46_patton_turret_type
				}
			}
			engine_type_slot = {
				required = yes
				allowed_module_categories = {
					tank_semi_large_engine_type
				}
			}
			suspension_type_slot = {
				required = yes
				allowed_module_categories = {
					tank_suspension_type
				}
			}
			armor_type_slot = {
				required = no
				allowed_module_categories = {
					tank_armor_type
				}
			}

			#		tank_ammo_type_module
			#	}
			#}

				required = no

					tank_radio_module
				}
			}
			special_type_slot_2 = {
				required = no
				allowed_module_categories = {

				}
			}
			special_type_slot_3 = {
				required = no

					tank_special_module
				}
			}
			special_type_slot_4 = {
				required = no
				allowed_module_categories = {
					tank_special_module
				}
			}
			special_type_slot_5 = {

					tank_special_module
				}
			}
			special_type_slot_6 = {
				required = no

					tank_special_module
				}
			}
			special_type_slot_7 = {
				required = no
				allowed_module_categories = {
					tank_special_module
				}
			}
		}

			special_type_slot_4 = empty
			special_type_slot_5 = empty
			special_type_slot_6 = empty
			special_type_slot_7 = empty
			armor_type_slot = empty

		#	tank_nsb_armor_upgrade
		#}
